::Hot Rod::

He steped to the left as the sword came down. He grabbed at the arm,
attempting to flip him.
"I dont want to fight you Optimus."

::Epyon::

He could understan and even respect what Kluster was saying. He had
mixed emotions. Part of him said it was logical to have peace now to
fight later. The other said that a true hero fights untill he cant fight
anymore. The destroys what would give the enemy power, and dies with
honor. He stayed where he was for now.
